summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMurad's Targeted Eye Depuffer visibly depuffs and firms under-eyes, with a microcurrent-inspired cooling formula that tightens over time for lasting results
details: DetailsBenefitsUnder-eye treatment that helps visibly firm, tighten and brighten in 2 weeks*Reduces the look of under-eye bagsCooling metal applicator helps massage away puffiness for a more awakened look.Key IngredientsMicrocurrent-Inspired Amino Acid Peptide: helps visibly firm, lift, and brighten.Ginseng, Lily, and Caffeine: visibly reduce the intensity of under-eye bags.Cooling Tip: instantly cools for an awakened, well-rested lookResearch ResultsIn 2 weeks:Clinically proven to reduce undereye puffiness*Subjects agree skin around the eye feels tightened and firmed***via expert grading results**Proven results reported by trial participants in a 4-week clinical study.Item 2614432How To UseGently squeeze out formula from the tube (a little goes a long way). Gently massage all around the eye area (including lids) with the cooling applicator tip. Pat in excess product with fingertips - do not rub.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Caffeine, Glycerin, Isopentyldiol, Propanediol, Octyldodecanol, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Pfaffia Paniculata Root Extract, Ptychopetalum Olacoides Bark/Root Extract, Lilium Candidum Flower Extract, Acmella Oleracea Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Tetrapeptide-1, Urea, Yeast Amino Acids, Trehalose, Inositol, Taurine, Betaine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, PVM/MA Decadiene Crosspolymer, Silica, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Benzoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Benzyl Alcohol, Xylitol, Caprylic Acid, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Tocopherol, Tin Oxide, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently squeeze out formula from the tube (a little goes a long way). Gently massage all around the eye area (including lids) with the cooling applicator tip. Pat in excess product with fingertips - do not rub.

reviews.headline: Works Great!
reviews.comments: I have dark circles under my eyes and I noticed improvement after using this product. I just finished my first tube. Murad is pricey but I think its worth every penny. Make sure you apply it daily to see results.

reviews.headline: Works Great!
reviews.comments: I have dark circles under my eyes and I noticed improvement after using this product. I just finished my first tube. Murad is pricey but I think its worth every penny. Make sure you apply it daily to see results.

reviews.headline: NO
reviews.comments:
This made more blood pull to my bags and made them puffier! I though maybe I was wrong so triied again with closer up images later on
Will not give me option to add photo, but wish it would. You can see it made my bags more voluminous and not irritated. Undee eyes is not where you want curves!

reviews.headline: Made my eyes look more puffy
reviews.comments:
I have been on the search for a product that will help the puffiness under my eyes. I tend to get bags under my eyes during allergy season and when it's really hot. I tried this product, but I feel like it highlighted the bags under my eyes due to the coloring shimmer that's in it. 
Glad to hear it works for some but it was a waste of money for me.

reviews.headline: Definitely recommend
reviews.comments: I wanted to try out this product for awhile before giving my honest review! I suffer from dark circles and after about a month of trying this baby out they have definitely faded! I would definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: ok
reviews.comments: this is a great eye de puffer by sadly for me and my weird eye bags it did not work. i have these wierd ones where they only come out when i smile. i think this may work for other people who have puffiness.

reviews.headline: subtle yet effective
reviews.comments: I wanted to express my thoughts on Murad's Targeted Eye Depuffer. The applicator adds a pleasant touch, enhancing the overall experience. The results are subtle, nothing overly dramatic, but it has seamlessly become a discreet part of my daily routine. received gifted

reviews.headline: Magic eye cream
reviews.comments:
This is literally the only eye cream I've ever found that really helps with dark circles. You can notice the difference after being consistent about a week.
This eye cream is perfect to use before doing your makeup, your concealer and under eye area will looks great

reviews.headline: Nice!
reviews.comments: I liked the applicator on the product a lot. I found that the product itself burned a bit upon initial application but felt better as time went on. I am not sure it is worth the hefty price tag but perhaps I need to use it for longer to form a solid opinion.

reviews.headline: Love this Depuffer!
reviews.comments: This Eye depuffer is very nice! The metal tip allows the product to glide on the eye with a nice cooling effect. I do wish the applicator had a smaller hole to not allow so much product to come out. That does not take away from the fact that the actual product is amazing! I've definitely seen a difference in my under eye since incorporating this into my routine!

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: This product was a gift and I have really enjoyed using it so far. It has made a noticeable change in decreasing the puffiness of my under eyes and my dark circles. I also love the applicator so much. I will continue to recommend this to my friends.

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: I've been using this eye cream for the past week and I have noticed a huge difference and improvement of my under eye circles, this cream is super thick and hydrating and feels great on my skin and helps brighten my under eyes

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Absolutely amazing, so good, lobe it it! Makes my skin feel amazing and so refreshed in the morning. No more under eyes bags. I would highly recommend. Makes my skin feel so soft and clear already just after two weeks of usage. Definitely would buy again.

reviews.headline: So Good!
reviews.comments: I was sent this from Murad in exchange for an honest review. This little product really does the trick! The cream is smooth and absorbs quickly and the metal applicator feels soothing on my skin. My eyes almost instantly feel and look refreshed and less puffy!

reviews.headline: Soothing and Calming
reviews.comments: I like that this comes with a metal applicator so that when I apply it gives my eyes a soothing effect.  It helps calm down my tired eyes.   It's very lightweight and doesn't require a lot to cover my eyes.

reviews.headline: awesome applicator
reviews.comments: i'm loving the applicator on the Targeted Eye Depuffer Treatment. i use it in the morning on my under eye and lids and it makes my eyes feel awake and look brighter without making any creases look weird like similar products in the past have.

reviews.headline: Definitely will buy again!
reviews.comments: This Duffing treatment really surprised me. There are a lot of products out there that promise to deep puff, but in the end they do not work at all. This one however, it worked so well it's one of my new favorite ice serum in the morning to help wake my eyes up and get them ready for the day. It's a super lightweight serum. It doesn't have any greasy feel to it and it layers under make up really well. Definitely a win.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I really enjoy using this cream! After putting it in the fridge, the metal tip helps make my puffy morning eyes look normal and awake right away! I love it, definitely a new favorite of mine and will repurchase

reviews.headline: De puffs and brightening
reviews.comments: I love murad skincare and this one is a similar eye product that works at evening out and also brightens the under eye area, blends in flawlessly plus using it as part of my no makeup makeup routine. Love the applicator

reviews.headline: Did not work for me
reviews.comments: Sadly, this product did not work for me. I have used it as directed for about a week and it has not visibly depuffed anything. If you are 20 years old and have a little puffiness under your eyes, then it probably will work fine. But for the 50+ crowd with actual eye bags, this product appears to have little or no effect on them. The only positive thing I can say is that it does feel nice on your skin upon application. But I did not buy it to massage my eye bags, I bought it to help reduce their puffiness.

media.headline: I will buy again and again
media.caption: did wonders for my 64yr old eyes

media.headline: Would love this without the reflecting complex
media.caption: The texture

media.headline: Would love this without the reflecting complex
media.caption: Love the applicator

media.headline: A must have for my tired eyes!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I recently tried the Murad Targeted Eye Depuffer with Peptides and was extremely impressed with the results. As someone who struggles with puffy under eyes, I have tried numerous products with minimal success. However, this eye depuffer has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine.

The packaging is sleek and convenient, making it easy to apply the product on-the-go. The formula itself is lightweight and absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving no greasy or heavy residue. I also appreciate that it is fragrance-free, making it suitable for those with sensitive skin like myself.

But the real star of this product is the peptides. These powerful ingredients work wonders in reducing puffiness and dark circles. After using the eye depuffer for just a few days, I noticed a significant difference in the appearance of my under eyes. They looked brighter, smoother, and more awake.

I also love that this product is targeted specifically for the delicate skin around the eyes. The peptides not only depuff, but also help to firm and tighten the skin, giving a more youthful appearance. I have even noticed a reduction in fine lines since incorporating this product into my routine.

Overall, I highly recommend the Murad Targeted Eye Depuffer with Peptides. It truly does what it claims and has become an essential in my skincare routine. Whether you struggle with puffiness, dark circles, or fine lines, this product is a game-changer. Give it a try and see the difference for yourself!
faceoff_positive.headline: Revitalize Your Eyes with Murad's Peptide-Packed Depuffer -

faceoff_negative.comments: This is a light cream, almost gel like texture with a pale golden color to it. I've been using this every morning for a little over a week now, and have mixed feelings. I love the cooling metal applicator, and I've definitely noticed the depuffing effect, I also like that it's safe to use on the entire eye area, not just the under eye, has no noticable scent to it. big wins, but it does take a little while to fully absorb, and has a light reflecting complex designed to illuminate and brighten up the eye area, however with wrinkles, and bags under my eyes that illumination sort of highlights those. I would love this eye cream without the added reflecting complex, with it though I'm a bit less in love. Keep in mind though I have mature skin, and have bags under my eyes, if you don't this would probably be perfect for you.
faceoff_negative.headline: Would love this without the reflecting complex
